MainCode.classTitle: land vehicles for travelling otherwise than on rails
MainCode.maingroupTitle: power-assisted or power-driven steering controlling steering depending on driving conditions sensed and responded to ; for non-deflectable wheels ; fluid pressure servomotors in general
MainCode.subclassTitle: motor vehicles trailers steering, or guiding on a desired track, of agricultural machines or implements wheels, castors, axles, increasing wheel adhesion vehicle tyres, tyre inflation or tyre changing connections between vehicles of a train or the like vehicles for use on rail and road, amphibious or convertible vehicles suspension arrangements heating, cooling, ventilating or other air treating devices windows, windscreens, non-fixed roofs, doors or similar devices, protective coverings for vehicles not in use propulsion plant arrangements, auxiliary drives, transmissions, controls, instrumentation or dashboards electric equipment or propulsion of electrically-propelled vehicles power supply for electrically-propelled vehicles passenger accommodation not otherwise provided for adaptations for load transportation or to carry special loads or objects arrangement of signalling or lighting devices, the mounting or supporting thereof or circuits therefor, for vehicles in general vehicles, vehicle fittings or vehicle parts not otherwise provided for servicing, cleaning, repairing, supporting, lifting, or manoeuvring, not otherwise provided for, brake arrangements, brake control systems or parts thereof air-cushion vehicles motor-cycles, accessories therefor testing of vehicles
